job.description:
Grade
(
relevant for internal applicants only

The S&P Global Platform team is a creative team of experts collaborating across divisions and driving continuous improvements in platform usability and innovation. The Platform team is building NextGen core capabilities to drive deeper Technology transformation for S&P Global. We are now looking for a motivated engineer in this space to help grow and expand our Platform Core Services.
The front-end UI/UX engineering for Platform Core Services is a key component of S&P Global's Technology organization that provides an enriched and valuable ecosystem of core capabilities for the S&P Global platform that drive innovation for our clients, within S&P Global divisions, and globally.
The Impact
The S&P Global Platform team is responsible for defining the next generation of the S&P Global Platform. To do this, the front-end engineer for the Platform Front-End team needs to understand the technical challenges and apply industry best practices to create scalable capabilities. This position will report to Common Capability Approach technical product management.
What’s In It For You
This position provides the opportunity to play a role in a highly involved strategic team across S&P Global. Through partnerships with divisional Technology, Data, Product, and Commercial Teams, you will work with talented individuals to help identify market and competitive influences to drive platform innovation and expansion.
Responsibilities
Creating POCs leveraging the latest web and cross-platform technologies
Implementing reusable code for future use
Implementing lean, clean, and high-quality code
Conferring with team colleagues to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions
Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards, is valid, is properly structured, and is compatible with browsers or devices.
Promoting positive team culture and staying vigilant to ensure that the team stays at its optimal state
Must Have
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Equivalent, Information System, or equivalent work experiences
A minimum of 5+ years of Full STACK significant experience in application development.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and Javascript/TypeScript
5+ years of work experience - Web Development, Front-End Software Engineering
2+ years of work experience with at least one of the front-end frameworks such as React
2+ years of work experience with CSS pre-processors such as LESS and SASS
2+ years of work experience with NodeJS and NPM environments
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and Javascript/Typescript
Proficiency in C# programming language and related frameworks, API development experience
Proficiency in software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies like Agile, Test-driven development.
Preferred
Experience in responsive and adaptive design
Experience working with relational Database
Experience Microsoft Azure DevOps
Experience with Git
Good To Have
Able to work well individually and with a team
Excellent verbal communication skills
Strong problem-solving skills
Good work ethic, self-starter, and results-oriented
Good problem-solving skills
Good interpersonal skills
S&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $68,300 to $155,900. Base salary ranges may vary by geographic location.
In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive plan.
